div.bibl: Domashnii Vrach (The House Physician), Vol. I, No. 2, Sept., 1916, P.-72. Type of Articles Published in The House Physician

body.p: Signs of Tuberculosis, Dr. L. Bogatyrev.
Consumption from social-economic point of view, Dr. Moses Sahud.
On the Question of Birth Control, M. Kubanskii.
First Aid at Home before the arrival of the Physician, M. K.
(Ed. Note: This is a sample of the material published in this periodical.)
